page.title: 17DAY IN THE LIFE OF...
page.content: CARRIE BEALE AGED 11 Yesterday I came to school at ten to 9 and I did some of{my ladybird {project.We then had playtime.}After that we wrote a{letter to a boy called {Ezekiel who lives in Kenya.} Our school adopted him last year. Then it was time for{packed lunch which consisted of cheese and pickle sandwiches, a raspberry yoghurt and an apple.When we had finished we did some of our{Domesday project work. We had to think of a{stall for our {school summer show.}Then we had another playtime.Afterwards we went swimming in{the new learner pool at {school}and then it was time to go home.
